TheSimpletonMod:AbundanceKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Increases the number of #yCrop stacks #yPlanted by cards.

TheSimpletonMod:BurningKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Burning creatures take damage at the end of their turn, then lose Burning.

TheSimpletonMod:ChilisKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Deals damage and applies #yBurning to all enemies when harvested.

TheSimpletonMod:DepletionKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Depletions are playable status cards that reduce your Energy and Draw next turn.

TheSimpletonMod:GnawberryKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Gnawberries are attack cards that deal moderate damage and heal HP.

TheSimpletonMod:HarvestKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Harvest different #yCrop stacks for various effects.

TheSimpletonMod:HuskKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Husks #b0-cost skill cards that exhaust to grant a small amount of Block.

TheSimpletonMod:MaturityKeyword.DESCRIPTION: A #yCrop is mature if you have stacks equal to or greater than its maturity level (usually 2, 3 or 5). One stack of each mature crop is #gHarvested at the start of your turn.

TheSimpletonMod:MushroomKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Gain random colorless cards when harvested.

TheSimpletonMod:OnionKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Applies Weak to a random enemy when harvested.

TheSimpletonMod:PotatoKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Yields 0-cost Spud attack cards when harvested.

TheSimpletonMod:SpudKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Spuds are 0-cost attack cards that exhaust to deal modest damage.

TheSimpletonMod:StrawberryKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Yields Gnawberry attack cards when harvested that also heal a small amount of HP.

TheSimpletonMod:TurnipKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yCrop. Yields an attack card when harvested that scales with number of stacks and adds a Turnips card to your hand.
